subject: Economy
question_en: What is the Gross Domestic Product (GDP) of India in 2020-21 in terms of USD?
question_hi: 2020-21 में भारत के ग्रॉस डॉ॰पियटी की पूर्वों की विवरण या विस्तर
explanation_en: According to World Bank data, the Gross Domestic Product (GDP) of India in terms of PPP (purchasing power parity) in 2020 was approximately Rs. 2200 billion. (Source: https://data.worldbank.org/indicator/SI.AGR.GDP.PP.CD?view=chart)
